features: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Shea Butter Soap helps replenish oils stripped from skin; use this body soap bar and cleanser for dry skin to leave skin looking vibrant
Made with African Rock Fig, this moisturizing bar soap is specially formulated with Manuka Honey to create a moisturizing barrier to hydrate dry skin; this body soap is gentle enough to use daily
Our organic skin care soap cleanses and calms dry skin, leaving it soft and moisturized; we use Certified Organic, Fair Trade, and Natural ingredients, which may vary in color and soap consistency
This body soap bar, bath soap and shower soap is a sulfate-free body wash that is carefully formulated with no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil and no sulfates
Also, a perfect bar soap for men, this body soap, bath soap and bar soap moisturizes from head to toe, thanks to natural ingredients such as Shea Butter found in all SheaMoisture soap bars
This bar soap is a block of cleansing bath soap and organic soap that has been tested on our family for generations, never on animals
body.description: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Shea Butter Soap helps replenish oils stripped from skin, use this body soap bar to leave skin looking vibrant. Made with African Rock Fig, this Soap Bar cleanser by SheaMoisture is specially formulated with Manuka Honey to create a moisturizing barrier to hydrate skin. This body soap is gentle enough to use daily. Also, a perfect soap for men, this body soap and bar soap for dry skin moisturizes from head to toe, thanks to natural ingredients such as Shea Butter found in all SheaMoisture soap bars. This bar soap is a block of cleansing soap and organic soap that has been tested on our family for generations, never on animals. SheaMoisture is known and loved for its natural, sustainably produced goodness. We are also pioneering Fair Trade through Community Commerce at home and abroad. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Ethically traded ingredients sustainably produced. Pioneering Community Commerce and Fair Trade since 1912. Tested on the Tucker family for four generations. Never on animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SheaMoisture Shea Butter Soap Manuka Honey And Mafura Oil Bar Soap
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing soap that feels wonderful and does not dry my skin and has a really nice scent that is clean and not a toxic commercial smell. I've used this bar soap for a number of years and I'm always disappointed when I can't find it in the stores any longer! I used to buy it many bars at a time when I'd find it available in a store like Bed Bath & Beyond! But they stopped carrying it when they ruined the format of their store and closed the brick and mortar. Not happy at all with the way that BBB handled the store closures by brining in all kinds of bazar inventory that the store never sold to begin with and tried to make the customers think they were getting some 'closeout' deals! It was a disgusting display of disloyalty to loyal consumers who kept their store doors open for a number of years! Now online I do not shop with them at all! If BBB does happen to carry. this soap with their online inventory I'd never trust that it was the same product anyway. That's what happens when someone gets the brilliant idea to disrespectfully deceive loyal customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lovely scent, lots of lather. My skin feels softer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with this.
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my skin feeling so soft. Probably won’t make anyone look younger, but feels soft and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It last a long time.
reviews.reviewText: I love Shea, butter and mango as the smell is wonderful.This is a large bar of soap for my hand, so I cut it in half to be able to hold it in my hand better well, I lathered it.It moisturize my skin very much, so, but I also use a glove that goes on my hands for scrubbing off dead skin.I do believe this helps the product to greatly moisturize my skinI highly recommend this product and will be purchasing my third bar when this one gets low. 💜👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Liked the way my skin felt after use, silky smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this soup
reviews.reviewText: I switched to this soup recently and I absolutely love it. It smells great, I feel clean and it lasts a decent amount of time. For the price, I think it's a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Could have a better smell. Kind of harsh for my skin type. Maybe not if I was in my early twenties.
